com.sessionm.api
Class SessionM

java.lang.Object
  com.sessionm.api.SessionM

public abstract class SessionM
extends Object

This is the main entry point into the SessionM SDK. Call methods on here to display SessionM activities, log actions and present the SessionM portal in your application.

wakeUp

public abstract void wakeUp(Context ctx)

Wake up the session when returning the app to the foreground. This should be called in an activity's "onResume" method

Parameters:
ctx - the context of the visible Activity

presentActivity

public abstract void presentActivity(Context ctx,
                                     String actionName)

Log an action and also present a SessionM activity if available. If an activity is unavailable the ActivityListener.onCancelled will be called.

Parameters:
ctx - the context the ActivityView instance to work with
actionName - the name of the action

presentActivity

public abstract void presentActivity(Context ctx)

Present an activity if available. If an activity is unavailable the ActivityListener.onCancelled will be called.

Parameters:
ctx - the context the ActivityView instance to work with
actionName - the name of the action

setMetaData

public abstract void setMetaData(Map<String,String> metaData)
set meta information that will get sent up to the server during the next Activity request

Parameters:
metaData - the meta information to send up with the next presentActivity call

setUserOptOutState

public abstract void setUserOptOutState(Context context,
                                        SessionM.USER_SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS userOptedOut)
change the current user's subscription status

Parameters:
context - an activity context to be passed in
userOptedOut - pass in USER_SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS.OPTED_OUT to opt-out the user;Pass in USER_SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS.OPTED_IN to opt-in.

getUserOptOutState

public abstract SessionM.USER_SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS getUserOptOutState(Context context)
get the User's subscription status. A session must be started for this value to return anything other than USER_SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS.UNKNOWN

Parameters:
context - an activity context to be passed in
